description:
Kyoko has gone outside of the base She apparently did it out of concern for Ryohei`s safety, but there are many from Millefiore family wandering about.  The group must find Kyoko as quickly as possible. Tsuna regrets not noticing Kyoko`s anxiety. At the same time, Hi-bird delivers a rescue signal. Tsuna is forced to decide how to handle both incidents. Tsuna splits himself, along with Gokudera, Yamamoto, and Lal into two teams and tries to solve both problems at the same time. But…
Source: crunchyroll
